title: Foundational Online Russian Language Learning: Applying the Technology-Balanced Teaching Method

context.additional_context: A language course for mathematics majors, emphasizing cultural context and daily communication skills

learning_goals: Acquire at least 50 basic vocabulary items related to daily greetings and self-introductions
Apply Russian alphabet and basic pronunciation rules with 80% accuracy
Understand at least 70% of key information from short sentences (3-5 words) when heard
Generate at least 10 simple question-and-answer sentences at A0-A1 proficiency levels
Read culture-related texts (approximately 50 words) and summarize core content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
